com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.matching

Interface When<K>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - Type of input value.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    When.Impl

    public interface When<K>
    Simple "functional pattern matching" system.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  When.Case<K,R>

      static class  When.InstanceOfCase<K,R> 
      static class  When.MatchesCase<K,R> 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LAST
      Standard evaluation (evaluates all but only returns last valid result).
      static int SHORT_CIRCUIT
      Short circuit case evaluation.
      static int STANDARD
      Standard evaluation (evaluates all but only returns first valid result).

    • Method Detail

      • When

        @SafeVarargs
static <K,R> OptObject<R> When(K value,
                                            When.Case<K,R>... cases)
        Tests cases against value and return first result.
        Type Parameters:
        K - Value type.
        R - Result type.
        Parameters:
        value - Value to test against case clauses.
        cases - Case clauses.
        Returns:
        First result of first matching case clause.

      • When

        @SafeVarargs
static <K,R> OptObject<R> When(int mode,
                                            K value,
                                            When.Case<K,R>... cases)
        Tests cases against value and return first result.
        Type Parameters:
        K - Value type.
        R - Result type.
        Parameters:
        mode - Mode of matching.
        value - Value to test against case clauses.
        cases - Case clauses.
        Returns:

        ifMatches - Function to call with receiver.
